title: Cellular (com.apple.cellular)
description: Use this section to define custom APNs for cellular data access.

Name.title: Data APN name
Name.description: The name of the data APN.

AuthenticationType.title: Data APN authentication type
AuthenticationType.description: Authentication type to use for the connection.

Username.title: Data APN user name
Username.description: The user name for the data APN account.

Password.title: Data APN password
Password.description: The password for the data APN account.

ProxyServer.title: Data APN proxy server
ProxyServer.description: The IP address or fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the data APN proxy server.

ProxyPort.title: Data APN proxy port
ProxyPort.description: The port number of the data APN proxy server.

DefaultProtocolMask.title: Data APN default IP versions
DefaultProtocolMask.description: Default Internet Protocol versions for connections. Set to the same value as AllowedProtocolMask.

AllowedProtocolMask.title: Data APN supported IP versions
AllowedProtocolMask.description: Supported Internet Protocol versions for connections

AllowedProtocolMaskInRoaming.title: Data APN supported roaming IP versions
AllowedProtocolMaskInRoaming.description: Supported Internet Protocol versions while roaming.

AllowedProtocolMaskInDomesticRoaming.title: Data APN supported domestic roaming IP versions
AllowedProtocolMaskInDomesticRoaming.description: Supported Internet Protocol versions while domestic roaming.

APNs.title: Data APN
APNs.description: List of Data APNs to configure

Name.title: Default APN name
Name.description: The name of the default APN.

AuthenticationType.title: Default APN authentication type
AuthenticationType.description: Authentication type to use for the connection.

Username.title: Default APN user name
Username.description: The user name for the default APN account.

Password.title: Default APN password
Password.description: The password for the default APN account.

AllowedProtocolMask.title: Default APN supported IP versions
AllowedProtocolMask.description: Supported Internet Protocol versions for connections
